QuestData.Title: The Missing Admiral
QuestData.Description:
Alright. According to the clues you found, that was Anduin's ship, and Admiral Taylor was the captain.
And Admiral Taylor's last entry says he was going to fight off the hozen and protect the vessel after the shipwreck.
The locals say these hozen sometimes take prisoners, and I didn't see Taylor's corpse anywhere among the wreckage. So you'll probably find Taylor at the hozen encampment to the northeast.
Get going, we have no time to lose!
QuestData.RewardText: <You found him, but the Admiral is unconscious. He looks on the verge of death.>
